Title: Allows patients up to twelve visits with an occupational therapist without a referral from a physician, nurse practitioner or other health care provider
Summary: Allows patients up to twelve visits with an occupational therapist without a referral from a physician, nurse practitioner or other health care provider; provides that the occupational therapist inform the patient of certain potential insurance issues.
LawCode: Amd ยง7901, Ed L; amd ยง5102, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the insurance law, in relation to allowing patients up to twelve visits with an occupational therapist without a referral from a physician, nurse practitioner or other health care provider
